CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type_Status__c, "Cancel/Rewrite"), ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type_Status__c, "Cancelled - Off Risk"), ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type_Status__c, "Cancelled - Nonpayment"), ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type_Status__c, "Cancelled By Insured") ), 0, 1 )
CustomField.label: Policy Count Val
